mapper.sql: ERR_HST_CD /*오류이력코드 */ , MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , MENU_URL /*메뉴URL */ , ERR_CD /*오류코드 */ , ERR_MSG_TXN /*오류메시지내역 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_ERR_HST A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD

SELECT A.ERR_HST_CD /*오류이력코드 */ , A.MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , A.MENU_URL /*메뉴URL */ , A.ERR_CD /*오류코드 */ , A.ERR_MSG_TXN /*오류메시지내역 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM TB_SYS_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH FROM TB_SYS_ERR_HST A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
